member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.BlipExtensions.GetIconToken(Rage.BlipSprite)
member.summary:
Gets the token used to display in formatted scaleform text (i.e. the scaleform uses the game function `SET_FORMATTED_TEXT_WITH_ICONS`).
Example:
Game.DisplayHelp($"Go to ~{BlipSprite.Waypoint.GetIconToken()}~.");
Game.DisplayHelp($"Go to ~{HudColor.Red.GetName()}~~{BlipSprite.Waypoint.GetIconToken()}~~s~."); // with a different color
member.param: The blip sprite.
member.returns: The with the icon token for the given blip sprite.

Represents a timer bar containing a list of checkpoints.
Each checkpoint is drawn as a circle which is either greyed out when not completed, black when failed or of a specific color when completed. Additionally, it can be crossed out.
The state of the checkpoints is defined using the class and the property.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.N.SetTextWrap(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: It sets the text in a specified box and wraps the text if it exceeds the boundaries. Both values are for X axis. Useful when positioning text set to center or aligned to the right.
member.param: Left boundary on screen position (0.0 - 1.0).
Right boundary on screen position (0.0 - 1.0).

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.N.SetScriptGfxAlign(System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: This function anchors script draws to a side of the safe zone. This needs to be called to make the interface independent of the player's safe zone configuration.
member.param:
The horizontal alignment. This can be 67 ('C'), 76 ('L'), or 82 ('R').
C (67) - Center: DRAW_TEXT starts in the middle of the screen, while DRAW_RECT starts on the right; both move with the right side of the screen.
L (76) - Left: Anchors to the left side, DRAW_RECT starts on the left side of the screen, same as DRAW_TEXT when centered.
R (82) - Right: DRAW_TEXT starts on the left side(normal 0,0), while DRAW_RECT starts some short distance away from the right side of the screen, both move with the right side of the screen.

The vertical alignment.This can be 67 ('C'), 66 ('B'), or 84 ('T').
B (66) - Bottom: DRAW_RECT starts about as far as the middle of the map from the bottom, while DRAW_TEXT is about rather centered.
C (67) - Center: It starts at a certain distance from the bottom, but the distance is fixed, the distance is different from 66.
T (84) - Top: Anchors to the top, DRAW_RECT starts on the top of the screen, DRAW_TEXT just below it.
member.remarks: Using any other value (including 0) will result in the safe zone not being taken into account for this draw. The canonical value for this is 'I' (73).

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.N.SetScriptGfxAlignParams(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the draw offset/calculated size for SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN. If using any alignment other than left/top, the game expects the width/height to be configured using this native in order to get a proper starting position for the draw command.
member.param: The X offset for the item to be drawn.
The Y offset for the item to be drawn.
The width of the item to be drawn.
The height of the item to be drawn.

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.TextStyle.#ctor(RAGENativeUI.TextFont,System.Drawing.Color,System.Single,RAGENativeUI.TextJustification,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure.
member.param: Determines the font of the text.
Determines the color of the text.
Determines the size of the text.
Determines how the text is aligned.
Determines the start of the bounds where the text will be wrapped, in relative coordinates along the X-axis.
Determines the end of the bounds where the text will be wrapped, in relative coordinates along the X-axis.
Determines whether a drop shadow is applied to the text.
Determines whether a black outline is applied to the text.
member.remarks:
Note, for creating your own styles, the recommended way is to derive them from a base , for example . With this method you only have to specify the properties you want to change. The following snippet shows how to give the style a dark red color and a drop shadow.
TextStyle myStyle = TextStyle.Default.With(color: Color.FromArgb(120, 0, 0), dropShadow: true);

member.name: M:RAGENativeUI.TextStyle.Apply
member.summary: Applies this style for the next text command.

member.param: If specified, determines the font of the text.
If specified, determines the color of the text.
If specified, determines the size of the text.
If specified, determines how the text is aligned.
If specified, determines the bounds where the text will be wrapped, in relative coordinates along the X-axis.
If specified, determines whether a drop shadow is applied to the text.
If specified, determines whether a black outline is applied to the text.
member.returns: A copy of this with the specified properties changed.
